pageTitle: Prime Minister’s itinerary for Thursday, November 11, 2021 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Ottawa, Ontario

Private meetings

10:45 a.m. The Prime Minister and Sophie Grégoire Trudeau will participate in the National Remembrance Day Ceremony. Minister of Veterans Affairs and Associate Minister of National Defence Lawrence MacAulay and Minister of National Defence Anita Anand will also be present.

National War Memorial

Notes for media:

  • Open coverage for accredited media
  • Media should arrive no later than 10:00 a.m.
  • Accreditation from the Canadian Parliamentary Gallery is required. For more information, contact Pierre Cuguen at pierre.cuguen@parl.gc.ca.

12:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will virtually participate in the Paris Peace Forum.

Media can register to watch the event via the following link: https://registration.parispeaceforum.org/?lang=en
